Game.Name: Honoo no Toukyuuji - Dodge Danpei (Japan)
Game.plot: Honoo no Doukyuuji: Dodge Danpei is a Sports game, developed by AIM and published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 1992.Cheat: Last Team PasswordAt the password screen (3rd option), enter the following password:Cheat: Last Team PasswordAt the password screen (3rd option), enter the following password:
Game.Notes: Dodgeball game with loads of anime style sequences and even an RPG style story mode. Based on the manga of the same name.
